About us

Cash for Junk Cars — Same-Day Free Pickup & Towing

We are customer-oriented top junk car buyer and eco-friendly business driven to provide our customers with the best junk car pickup team in your area.

For almost 30 years, we’ve offered top dollar for those who seek junk car removal services. Whether old, wrecked, flood or fire damaged, or just unwanted, we specialize in recycling all cars, SUVs, vans, and trucks. We are an experienced junk car buyer, and we work every day to improve our service so that we can provide you with the best junk car removal service.

SAME DAY SERVICE AVAILABLE! PRICE QUOTE GUARANTEED! TOP DOLLAR PAID FOR YOUR VEHICLE!

Book Online
Call us now (855) 547-1550

Our values

  • High Standards

    We have been working in this field for almost 30 years. During this time, we have gained a lot of experience in vehicle removal. High quality customer service and safety are our highest priorities.

  • Customer Service Satisfaction

    When you contact our company to sell your junk car, our experienced and friendly customer support operators are happy to welcome you. You can ask any question you want about car removal and get a detailed answer.

  • High Standards

    We understand that time is a valuable resource, so we strive to make our services as easy as possible for you. You don't have to wait for us for a long time.

  • Free Paperwork

    We don't like bureaucracy. That is why we try to arrange your junk car removal and disposal process with no paperwork, as much as possible. Our team takes care of all the administrative and transportation tasks.

  • Free Pickup

    You don't have to worry about getting your old car to our junkyard. We take care of that task ourselves. You also don't have to worry about the cost of towing your vehicle. It's completely free for you.

  • Highest Pricing Guaranteed

    We are a buyer of junk cars who understands and appreciates its clients. We want you to be satisfied with our deal. That is why we strive to provide the highest quality services and guarantee the hig
